subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_ar: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_fr: Jaipur est la capitale de Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the famous dance form of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के कला का प्रमोट क्या है?
explanation_en: Kathputli is a famous folk dance form originated from Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कथपूट्ली - राजस्थान के फोक का प्रमोट क्या है?
explanation_ar: كوثبوتلي هو شكل رقص شعبي شهير ينحدر من راجستان.
explanation_fr: La danse de tradition populaire Kathputli est originaire de Rajasthan.
explanation_zh: 基于尼斯坦的传统文化社区人类社区人类社区
